page.title: 11SOUTH SHIELDS CENTRAL AREA
page.content:
The town centre of{South Shields}is an area of diversity. It is in the northern part of the town with the{ {River Tyne}lying to the north-west and the{Harbour}and{North Sea}to the north-east.
Here is the largest shopping centre in the borough,with chain stores and locally-owned businesses in and around {King Street}and{Fowler Street,}and a lively open-air market held in the{ {Market Square}around the Old Town Hall.{Ocean Road,}with its restaurants (Indian,Chinese,Italian as well as Fish and Chip shops) and boarding houses, leads eastwards to the pier and three well-tended parks,Little Haven and Sandhaven Beaches and the Ocean Beach Amusement Park.
